returns.title: Returns & Exchanges
returns.subtitle: Learn about our return policy and how to process a return
returns.timeframe_text: You have 30 days from the date of delivery to initiate a return for most items. Items must be in new, unused condition with all original packaging.
returns.conditions_text: Items must be in new, unused condition with all original packaging. Items that are damaged, used, or missing parts cannot be returned.
returns.process_text: To initiate a return, go to your order history, select the item, and request a return. You will receive a return label via email. Pack the item securely and ship it back using the provided label.
returns.exchange_text1: We offer exchanges for items that are defective or damaged upon arrival.
returns.exchange_text2: To request an exchange, follow the same process as for returns but select "exchange" instead.
returns.exchange_text3: Replacement items will be shipped once the original item is received.
returns.restriction2: Intimate or sanitary goods cannot be returned
returns.refund_text1: Refunds will be processed to the original payment method. Please allow 5-10 business days for the refund to appear in your account.
returns.refund_text2: If you paid with a credit card, the refund will appear on your next statement. For other payment methods, please contact us for details.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our products, shipping, and policies
faq.q1: How do I create an account?
faq.a1: You can create an account by clicking the "Register" button in the header. Fill in your details and follow the instructions to complete the registration process.
faq.a2: We offer returns within 30 days of delivery. Items must be in new, unused condition with all original packaging. Please visit our Returns page for more information.
faq.a3: Yes, we ship to select international destinations. Please check availability and shipping costs during the checkout process.
faq.q4: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a4: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and other secure payment methods. All transactions are protected with SSL encryption.
faq.a5: Yes, we use industry-standard SSL encryption to protect your payment information. We do not store your credit card details on our servers.
faq.q6: When will my order be processed?
faq.a6: Orders are typically processed within 1-2 business days. You will receive email notifications when your order ships with tracking information.
faq.a7: Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days. Expedited options are available for faster delivery. International shipping times vary by destination.
faq.q8: Do you offer tracking for orders?
faq.a8: Yes, all orders include tracking information. You will receive an email with tracking details once your order ships.
faq.q9: What shipping carriers do you use?
faq.a9: We use reliable shipping carriers such as UPS, FedEx, and USPS. The specific carrier depends on your location and shipping method selected.
faq.q10: How do I know if a product is in stock?
faq.a10: Product availability is displayed on each product page. If a product is out of stock, it will be clearly marked, and you can sign up for a restock notification.
faq.a11: Yes, all our products undergo rigorous quality testing before shipping. We work with trusted suppliers and manufacturers to ensure quality standards.
faq.a12: Many of our products come with manufacturer warranties. Warranty information is provided in the product description and packaging.
faq.contact_support: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Please chat to our friendly team for more assistance.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Last updated: December 1, 2025
privacy.intro: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our services.
privacy.information: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, make a purchase, or contact us for support. This may include:
privacy.information1: Personal identification information (name, email address, phone number, etc.)
privacy.information2: Payment information (credit card details, billing address, etc.)
privacy.information4: Technical information (IP address, browser type, device information, etc.)
privacy.information5: Usage data (pages visited, time spent on site, etc.)
privacy.how: We use the information we collect for various purposes, including:
privacy.how1: To process and fulfill your orders
privacy.how2: To provide customer support and respond to your requests
privacy.how3: To send you marketing communications (with your consent)
privacy.how4: To improve our website and services
privacy.protection: We use administrative, technical, and physical security measures to help protect your personal information. While we use commercially acceptable means to protect your personal information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
privacy.retention: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with our legal obligations. When we no longer need your information, we will securely delete it.
privacy.changes: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.
privacy.contact: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Last updated: December 1, 2025
terms.intro: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by these terms, please do not use this service.
terms.use1: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials on LuxStore's website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title.
terms.use2: This license shall automatically terminate if you violate any of these restrictions and may be terminated by LuxStore at any time.
terms.disclaimer1: The materials on LuxStore's website are provided on an 'as is' basis. LuxStore makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.
terms.disclaimer2: Further, LuxStore does not warrant or make any representations concerning the accuracy, likely results, or reliability of the use of the materials on its website or otherwise relating to such materials or on any sites linked to this site.
terms.limitations: In no event shall LuxStore or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on LuxStore's website, even if LuxStore or a LuxStore authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage.
terms.accuracy: The materials appearing on LuxStore's website could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. LuxStore does not warrant that any of the materials on its website are accurate, complete, or current. LuxStore may make changes to the materials contained on its website at any time without notice.
terms.links: LuxStore has not reviewed all of the sites linked to its website and is not responsible for the contents of any such linked site. The inclusion of any link does not imply endorsement by LuxStore of the site. Use of any such linked website is at the user's own risk.
terms.modifications: LuxStore may revise these terms of service at any time without notice. By using this website you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these terms of service.
terms.governing: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the United States and you irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that State or location.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.subtitle: Last updated: December 1, 2025
cookies.what: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. Cookies are widely used by website owners to make their websites work, or to work more efficiently, as well as to provide reporting information.
cookies.how: We use cookies for several reasons, including:
cookies.how1: To enable certain functions of our website
cookies.how2: To provide analytics and improve our services
cookies.necessary: These cookies are essential for the proper functioning of our website. Without these cookies, certain features would not work properly.
cookies.performance: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.
cookies.functionality: These cookies allow our website to remember choices you make and provide enhanced features and personalization.
cookies.targeting: These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant ads on other sites.
cookies.manage: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies that are already on your computer and you can set most browsers to prevent them from being placed.
cookies.manage2: Here is how to manage cookies for the most commonly used browsers:
cookies.firefox: Mozilla Firefox: options â†’ privacy & security
cookies.edge: Microsoft Edge: settings â†’ cookies and site permissions
cookies.changes: We may update our Cookie Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Cookie Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.
cookies.contact: If you have questions about our Cookie Policy, please contact us at:

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Discover our story and what makes us unique
about.storyPara1: Founded with a vision to revolutionize e-commerce, we've grown from a small startup to a global platform serving thousands of customers worldwide.
about.storyPara2: Our journey began with a simple goal: to provide high-quality products with exceptional customer service at competitive prices.
about.storyPara3: Today, we continue to innovate and expand our offerings while staying true to our core values of quality, integrity, and customer satisfaction.
about.storyPara4: We're proud of our growth and excited about our future as we continue to serve our valued customers.
about.valuesSubtitle: Principles that guide everything we do
about.qualityFirstDesc: We prioritize quality in every product we offer and service we provide.
about.customerFocusedDesc: Our customers are at the heart of everything we do.
about.globalReachDesc: We serve customers in over 50 countries around the world.
about.secureShoppingDesc: Your security and privacy are our top priorities.
about.teamSubtitle: The dedicated professionals behind our success
about.joinSubtitle: Ready to experience the future of shopping?
